snippet: A replica of the ship that the French general Lafayette sailed in 1780 will recreate his journey from France to the United States.
abstract: A replica of the ship that the French general Lafayette sailed in 1780 will recreate his journey from France to the United States.
lead_paragraph: A reconstruction of the ship that Lafayette sailed will recreate the journey the French general made in 1780 when he brought news of French support and troops for the American Revolutionary War.

headline.main: Lafayette’s Ship, and Journey, Will Be Recreated
